nodes.bodyText: I don't think we need to do this - the List iterator is supposed to be simple and in this case the JIT should eliminate its allocation.

You're right, Zulu 11.0.7 seems to be incapable of figuring out that these iterators can be stack-allocated while Zulu 1.8.0_242 does figure it out, so it seems to be a JVM problem. I'll revert this change and investigate that separately.
